rev.desc.rev.desc: add new panel merge.lines, use rad to merge lines instead of jscall which has limitations
update panel merge, change merge code to JS:
Modified merge panel to merge skip.query.rewrite field value for logical name solution
update panel merge,use.format, use.master, add jscall("debugUtils.log")
Updated for loop to add two additional merge expressions:
$L.p in javascript.pre in $L.link=$L.i in javascript.pre in $L.master;
$L.p in javascript.post in $L.link=$L.i in javascript.post in $L.master
if a joinfile is used to display a record the master link is not correctly retrieved because the se.get.link application did not get have the special object param.
added a parameter for the special object type: $INTO.SPECIAL
on the start panel I changed $L.file.name to be set as follows:
This way if there is a special object type that will be used...if not then it will use $INTO.FILE as it did before.

descript.descript: add new panel merge.lines, use rad to merge lines instead of jscall which has limitations
update panel merge, change merge code to JS:
Modified merge panel to merge skip.query.rewrite field value for logical name solution
update panel merge,use.format, use.master, add jscall("debugUtils.log")
Updated for loop to add two additional merge expressions:
$L.p in javascript.pre in $L.link=$L.i in javascript.pre in $L.master;
$L.p in javascript.post in $L.link=$L.i in javascript.post in $L.master
if a joinfile is used to display a record the master link is not correctly retrieved because the se.get.link application did not get have the special object param.
added a parameter for the special object type: $INTO.SPECIAL
on the start panel I changed $L.file.name to be set as follows:
This way if there is a special object type that will be used...if not then it will use $INTO.FILE as it did before.
